column4: Hey is there any way to add Fiji to the timezones in Gnome???
I think Fiji is a wellknown country
why it isn't there in the timezones?
click the clock. go to locations. try to type in Fiji. nothing.
Otherwise, select the timezone manually (Pacific -> Fiji)
Indeed, seems not :( Enter it manually, I guess.
yeah i got it. thanks for your help!
